page.title: 06Evacuation-tunnel disaster
page.content: Our school was in the fire path and later on,the same day the fire started,at about 10.40am,we were{ {evacuated}from our school.We all walked down to Littleborough High School, even having to leave behind valuable things.Our infant department, in a separite building, also had to be evacuated. Some people who had relations at the High School were allowed to go home with them,but the rest of us stayed till after dinner when our parents came down to pick us up. Actually, we had a very nice Christmas dinner whilst we waited. Many people were evacuated from their homes_including people from our school.Some were lodged in local centres in Littleborough, others went to relations.
